citation: “Allen Ginsberg and Michael McClure reading - Part 2." Jack Kerouac School of Disembodied Poetics, 16 June, 1976. Genre: Poetry Reading. The Internet Archive. https://archive.org/details/naropa_allen_ginsberg_and_michael2.
label: Out of the Cage -  Michael McClure and Ghost Tantras

children.text: U.S. poet Michael McClure (1932-2020) reads from his book Ghost Tantras (1964) at the Naropa Institute on June 16, 1976. Transcripts and editorial notes by Matthew Kilbane.
